mpmToolbox.gui.audio.utilities

Class SpectrogramComputationWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.SwingWorker<SpectrogramImage,java.lang.Void>
      • mpmToolbox.gui.audio.utilities.SpectrogramComputationWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<SpectrogramImage>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<SpectrogramImage>

    public class SpectrogramComputationWorker
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<SpectrogramImage,java.lang.Void>
    A usual instance of Thread blocks the GUI. So we have to execute code that takes a considerable amount of time in a SwingWorker, see https://www.codementor.io/@isaib.cicourel/swingworker-in-java-du1084lyl for a tutorial.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javax.swing.SwingWorker

        javax.swing.SwingWorker.StateValue
